page.title: 02My School 1985
page.content: My school has two playgrounds, 7 classes, a playing field, a sandpit and a swimming pool. We are losing two teachers this year and are employing one teacher so next term we will have 6 classes instead of 7.The school doesn't have a hall but we rent the village hall across the road. We hold events in the hall connected with the school, like discos and exhibitions of childrens work. Every morning we have an assembly in the hall. The juniors have their lunch hour at 12.10, most of us stay for sandwiches.We come to school 5 days a week for 6 hours and 15 minutes a day including 1 hour 20 minutes playtime. There are approximately 190 children in the school. We are very lucky to have 3 classroom assistants who help out in the classrooms. We have 2 other dinner helpers, 2 cooks and 4 cleaners.
